name: Rise Up (2022)
description:
The most challenging and fun game of 2018! Protect your balloon with your shield while it's going up! Watch out for obstacles.

Move your shield with your finger to protect your balloon. Clear your way as you get higher and higher!

Controlling your shield is very easy, but it's hard to reach high scores!

Challenge your friends to improve your score!

Game Features:

  • free

  • Control with one finger

  • Different obstacles and experience each time

  • Endless gameplay
